channel.title: SEC and CFTC actions on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in SEC and CFTC actions on FinanClub

item.title: WFC
item.description: score:1416 Chances: Discussing Wells Fargo & Company’s potential as a value investor’s pick. Highlighting the company’s introduction of a special-purpose credit program to address barriers to homeownership. Advising to focus on Wells Fargo’s long-term future despite past challenges. Noting insider stock sales by Wells Fargo & Company insiders over the past year.
